content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Events at the Canterbury International Hotel

The Canterbury International Hotel  provides  you with an elegant setting for any celebration.

Celebrate a Birthday, Engagement, Christening, Wedding or your end of year Christmas Party in your choice of our spectacular rooms.

Open seven days a week, the Canterbury International Hotel will host your function or event from 2 to 200 guests.

Our specialist Function and Event team will assist you every step of the way, with personalised planning, flexibility and eye for detail.

Our international chefs will delight your guests with a banquet designed to your individual requirements.  Specific dietary requests are a speciality.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ el_class=”rightColumn-Col2″][vc_column_text]

Location and Access

Conveniently located at the gateway to the beautiful Yarra Valley and Dandenong Ranges, and only 20 minutes from Melbourne CBD.

326-330 Canterbury Road
Forest Hill VIC 3131
Australia

Enquire Now
 +61 3 9878 4111
 Email Us
Fact Sheets

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

High Tea Parties

Celebrating a special birthday milestone? Why not opt for a High Tea Party?
View our High Tea Packages[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Personal Touches

Our events team specialise in creating memorable events. We can assist you in coordinating styling, catering and all the personal touches that make every occasion unique.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]

Beverage Packages

What’s a party with a few drinks to celebrate? We have a range of packages to suit every occasion and budget. Our events coordinator will work with you to customise your package to suit your requirements.
View our beverage packages[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
